data.title: Great food!
data.text: We visited for lunch and ordered the shrimp po boy and a cheeseburger. Each came with French fries. The food was hot and delicious. Prices are $10 and up. Great service and we would return again.

Best seafood I had in a 2 week visit to Florida! I tried as much of it as I could in one visit, and I wish I had more time and a bigger appetite! The place is quaint and understated, their food isn't. They serve margaritas by the pint and the portions are monstrous! The staff are friendly and attentive and overall I had a great night.

data.title: Good Food & Large Portions
data.text:
My partner and I went there last nite for the 1st time and were pleasantly impressed with this restaurant.  We both ordered from the special's menu.  She had the wild caught salmon and I had the mahi mahi.  Our main courses were very tasty and well presented.  She had also ordered a side salad that was not very fresh and the lettuce selection was poor and not well trimmed.

The main courses were very good and the portions were huge.  Neither of us could finish our plates.  The price of the visit though seemed somewhat high.  Price for two including 1 house wine and 1 draft beer was $66.  I know other very good restaurants on the seashore drive where this would have been less than $55, (example Sunset Grill).

We will go back here but probably for the  lunch menu where the prices should be more reasonable.

data.title: JT's Seafood Shack
data.text: We eat at JT's almost every Saturday since we are local and love the food, cold, cold beer and service.  Especially love the wraps and you can substitute fresh fish like Salmon or Tuna.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It's always good to see you, Gail! Glad you enjoy the service as much as the beer and wraps. Looking forward to your next visit.

All the best,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always good food.
data.text: Just not good food, but also great service. Great menue selection for anybody. Love a good meal and a couple of great draft beers.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Glad you enjoy the service as much as the food and beer! We look forward to your next visit.

Best,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Lunch
data.text: Nice little local seafood place.  Had the a crusted red snapper in a creole chutney with three-cheese risotto.  It was excellent; would definitely recommend.  Kid split a crab pot and the crab was cooked perfectly!

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Glad you enjoyed it, Tony! Great recommendations with the red snapper and crab pot. Those are definitely some Florida favorites. I hope we can see you and the family again soon!

All the best,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Tuna
data.text: I really enjoyed their seared tuna on my last visit. Also substituted the pasta salad for the fries. Good seafood at a reasonable price.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your tuna! If this was your first visit, I hope we can have you back soon. - John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good bar, good sports TVs
data.text:
This place has all the games being played, and a good bar for a beer.  They have a nice out side yard with music on Saturday and Sunday.  So, that is very positive. 

Now for the food. Below average burger;  actually mine was ordered medium rare and it was charred.  Chicken sandwich was okay. Gumbo was thick but flavorless. 
One night I ordered their signature steam pot: snow crab, shrimp, clams, mussels, sausage, corn, potatoes.  Flavorless!  Worse yet, the crab legs were dry and stringy.  
The sausage was bland.  I enjoyed the potatoes and the corn more that any of the seafood.  

So, if you are looking for a beer, or hanging out to hear music/watch a game/play trivia, go to JT's.  If you are looking for good FL seafood or a good meal --- go somewhere else.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Glad you enjoyed watching the game with a beer, but I'm sorry to see you were disappointed in the steam pot and your burger. It sounds like there was a mix-up on our end. The seafood should be full of flavor, and the burger cooked to your preference. I'd love to have you back for a beer and another chance to impress with the menu. Hope we can see you again soon.

All the best,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Food & Service
data.text: We had blackened chicken with crab cake sandwich, they were excellent, I cold beer to top it off... Very friend staff, a real home environment... Was very impressed

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Deborah, it sounds like you had a really great time with us, and I'm thrilled! Thank you so much for trying us out -- it's really encouraging to know that you so enjoyed yourself. Next time you're in our area, I hope we get to serve you again!

Until next time,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good fried fish in the Hammock
data.text: So we love fried fish and JT's nails it every time.  The black beans & rice are really good.  We've eaten different items on the menu, and we haven't had bad food!  Laid back and easy, lots of Hammock locals make JT's a local hangout.  Dress is super casual, flip flops, shorts, jeans, t's, and the occasional Tommy Bahama cocktail shirts are worn there!

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Donna, we sure do love our fried fish around here! Thank you so much for your support. It's such a treat to know that you're a fan and we can't wait until we get to welcome you back again in the future.

Until next time,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stop!
data.text: Good was excellent and appropriately priced, great selection to satisfy picky eaters, nice atmosphere and easy to find and get to. My wife and I both had the crab steam pot, others in our party had different dishes. Everyone left full and satisfied.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Jeremiah, we work hard to make sure everyone who comes to see us is satisfied! It's really great to know that even the picky eaters in your group found something they loved. Thank you so much for your visit and this helpful review. Hope to welcome you back again soon for another great meal! 

Until then,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: EXCELLENT FOOD
data.text: Passed by and noticed the many cars parked!!! That alone says it all! Went there today for lunch. James, our waiter was very attentive. The shrimp and scallops were great! The coleslaw was PERFECT!!! I will definitely go back on my next visit to Palm Coast!!!

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're so incredibly grateful for our amazing community, Mary. We love our fans so much and it's wonderful that you could join that group. Thank you for this amazing review. We can't wait to serve you again!

Take care,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

user_location.name: New York, New York, United States

data.title: Great Find
data.text: We saw this place and decided to give it a try and glad we did. The food was great and the ambience was lively but not an issue as good to see people having a good time. Service was quick and efficient and good value.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Fredahills, we're glad you decided to give us a try too! We absolutely love when we get to meet new friends. We hope your meal here was the first of many in the future!

Take care,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Place
data.text: Good food, great staff, nice atmosphere.  Lots of choices which include the freshest fish.  Children's menu, too.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It's an honor to serve you and your family! Thank you for all your support. This review is such a big help for us and we hope to get many chances to cook for you in the future.

Until next time,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not for me
data.text: Very disapointed in my dinner here.  I had tuna and it was void of any tast. The noise level was so high that it was hard to have a conversation. Finally it took over an hour for our dinner to arrive.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Mike, I can imagine why you were disappointed in your experience with us, and I want to apologize that we weren't the kind of place you were expecting. We definitely have a fun and upbeat vibe here, which is why the music is how it is, and our guests usually love it. As for the service: I'll definitely be looking into this. Could you give me a call at (386) 446-4337 so I can find out who your server was and when you were here?

Hope to hear back,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food!!!
data.text: Me & my husband enjoyed a nice dinner Sunday night! The food was great but the crab legs were especially awesome and we had amazing service!!!

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Gotta love those crab legs! I'm so glad that you and your husband had a great Sunday night date night with us. I want to thank you so much for giving us a try. Next time you're in our neck of the woods, we hope to welcome you back! 

Until then,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Excellent service, good prices. Staff was very friendly. I had the Fish Reuben, which was delicious.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for this! I'm so happy that you loved your Reuben so much. We have an excellent kitchen staff here and I'm so proud of them. Hopefully we can cook for you again soon! 

Take care,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: lunch 2 times in 2 days
data.text: we had lunch here 2 time in 2 days.  food is great.  so is service.  i had tuna first day and my wife had their grilled chicken salad.  salad was good and big.  tuna was fantastic.  next day had grilled fish stuffed sandwich in whole wheat tortilla.  a lot of food that was good.  i liked their seafood gumbo and black beans and rice as well.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Twice in two days? Now that's just amazing. Thank you so much for all the support. I'm thrilled that you and your wife so enjoyed our food. Next time you're in our area, we'd love to serve you again!

Until next time,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ok
data.text: The food isn't bad, but it's not worth what they charge. The service was pretty good. I have a hard time believing this is the #5 restaurant in town.

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Jessica, thank you for giving us a try and for following up with this helpful feedback. We use only the very best ingredients for our homemade recipes and have an excellent team here. That being said, we still keep our prices as low as possible. We have a really great community of regulars here, and we'd love for you to come back and find another dish that'll show you why we're ranked so high. 

Take care,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: World class customer service - good food
data.text: This restaurant was actually recommended by a waitress from another eatery. We were very pleased with the food & customer service! Jeremiah was our waiter & he was great! He was very attentive & friendly and made our experience enjoyable. I had the Minorcan Gumbo to start. Wasn't quite sure what to expect, but since I love Minorcan chowder, I decided to try it. It is very different from chowder. It is loaded with veggies & clams but I did not care for it. Next I had the shrimp & grits that was very tasty! My husband had the fried shrimp & said it was good. We both had the peanut butter pie for dessert! Oh my! Jeremiah told us it was homemade & boy was it good! Had a nice peanut butter taste & was very rich. Yum! We will definitely return here on future vacations!

owner_response.author: Brandy D, Owner at JT's Seafood Shack, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I'm so glad that you got to check us out while vacationing in Palm Coast! It sounds like you got to try a great sampling of our menu, and I'm thrilled that you found some things you love. Thank you so much for this fantastic review.

Until next time,
John Doering, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response
